mapper.select: select u.nickname, count(b.status = 0) as auditing_count, count(b.status = 1) as pass_count, count(b.status = 2) as no_pass_count, count(select * from record where user_id = #{id} and blog_id is not null and type = 0 and is_deleted = 0) as up_count, count(select * from record where user_id = #{id} and blog_id is not null and type = 1 and is_deleted = 0) as down_count, count(select * from record where user_id = #{id} and blog_id is not null and type = 2 and is_deleted = 0) as star_count, from user u left join blog b on u.id = b.author_id and b.is_deleted = 0 where u.id = #{id} and u.is_deleted = 0

select u.nickname, count(b.status = 1) as pass_count, count(up.blog_id) as up_count, count(down.blog_id) as down_count from user u left join blog b on u.id = b.author_id and b.is_deleted = 0 left join up on b.id = up.blog_id and up.is_deleted = 0 left join down on b.id = down.blog_id and down.is_deleted = 0 where u.id = #{id} and u.is_deleted = 0
